name: POV: You're Bored
description:
-around 5-10 minutes of gameplay

-6 endings + 1 secret-ish ending

-6 ending chibi CGs

-a gallery with unlockable CGs and backgrounds

-a cat with a very fluffy tail

CREDITS

Writer/Programmer/Artist - meliandur

CC Assets:

Background Music - "Where I Belong" by Migfus20, "MSfxP6 - 107_6" by Erokia

Main Menu Music - looped excerpt by Timbre of "Track: 51" by Migfud20

DISCLAIMER

This is not a dating sim.

Currently there is an issue where you cannot download/install the game with the itch.io client. If you want to play this game you must download it through the itch.io website.
